document.masterDocTitle: A review of Conocetus Desbrochers des Loges, 1875, subgenus of Polydrusus Germar, 1817 (Coleoptera, Curculionidae, Entiminae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A review of Conocetus Desbrochers des Loges, 1875, subgenus of Polydrusus Germar, 1817 (Coleoptera, Curculionidae, Entiminae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Below is an overview of the presently valid species belonging to the subgenera
Conocetus
and
Denticonocetus
subgen. nov., as well as their synonyms as proposed here.

paragraph.taxonomicName: Polydrusus bardus Gyllenhal in Schoenherr et al. , 1834: 143

subSubSection.paragraph:
Conocetus cylindricollis –
Schilsky 1910 : 23 ( = homonym of
Polydrusus
( Leucodrusus ) cylindricollis Boheman
, 1840
; lapsus)

Conocetus bardus Desbrochers des Loges, 1902 : 124
(= homonym of
Polydrusus ( Conocetus ) bardus Gyllenhal, 1834
)

paragraph.taxonomicName: Polydrusus siculus Desbrochers des Loges, 1872 , p. 233
